title: The Crystal Orientation of Li Metal Anodes: A Better Understanding of Lithium-ion Solid-state Batteries
content: Enabling the use of Li metal as an anode in all solid-state batteries (ASSB) promises higher energy density and safer operation than current Li-ion batteries, thanks to the possibility of integrating non-flammable solid-state electrolyte [1]. In recent years, the increasing demand for safe electrical energy storage, especially in the transportation sector, has pushed research and development of ASSB to rapid and continuous growth [2].
